amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part A of House Report 119-255 to prohibit the provision of gender transition procedures, including surgery or medication, through the Exceptional Family Medical Program.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the provision of gender transition procedures, including surgery or medication, through the Exceptional Family Medical Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 210 (Roll no. 245).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 221 - 210 (Roll no. 245).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
